title: The Nature of tuberculosis
brief_description: Shows infected lung, tuberculosis operation in Japan, the infection and how it grows, removal of the infected part and possible treatment with rest and new drugs. Supervised by Dr Hideo Kumabe with technical guidance by the Research Institute for Tuberculosis of the Anti-tuberculosis Association Japan.
